content: 1 m anx fuchsia hedge s ocks with the mild climate we have hedges of fuchsias the roadsides are blooming in red and fuchsia inspiring this pa cid 425 ern the word manx means related to the isle of man in gaelic please read the pa cid 425 ern thoroughly before star cid 415 ng you will find comments at the end of the pa cid 425 ern highlighted with a * and number where you might need them needles circular needle 2 5mm us 1 ½ or according to your swatch working with magic loop yarn 100gr sock yarn fingering/light fingering weight 100gr/410m or 448 yards solid and slightly variegated works best sizes s m/l all sizes cast on 40 sts addi cid 415 onal 400/400/456 beads size 6/0 or 8/0 high contrast to your yarn beading tool please test some do cut your yarn tapestry needle 2 s cid 415 tch markers scrap yarn and a crochet hook gauge garter s cid 415 tch unblocked 30 s cid 415 tches x 32 ribs or 64 row = 10x10cm stockine cid 425 e s cid 415 tch unblocked 32x40 = 10x10cm used techniques provisional cast on / tutorial here https //youtu be/ox5mmajzqx0 si=kh4gyml_iupmugxr stringing beads / tutorial here https //youtu be/68lth1o1x-8 si=blxfy8e3tepr95tu beaded kni cid 427 ng / tutorial here https //youtu be/w-i0xsascvk si=d0hpnobv5foclozg kni cid 425 ed cast on / tutorial here https //youtu be/btgt7ke1c_k si=eu4u6stugf1x_zbg © silke strohschenk please respect my work for private use only 2 abbrevia cid 415 ons m1 m2 s cid 415 tch markers rib one garter s cid 415 tch rib consis cid 415 ng of 2 kni cid 425 ed row st s s cid 415 tch es bst s cid 415 tch with bead in front rs right side k - knit ws wrong side p - purl pm place marker ssk slip slip knit together sm slip marker p2tog purl 2 together sl1pwyf slip 1 purlwise with yarn in front sl1wyb slip 1 knitwise with yarn in back k2tog knit 2 together start with stringing onto your working yarn 200 200/228 beads with your preferred method push them further down the yarn so that you have space for the first rib without beads *1 if you decide on the 3 coloured version please make sure that you string the beads backwards the beads you put first will be used last © silke strohschenk please respect my work for private use only 3 leg cast on with your scrap yarn 40 40/40 s cid 415 tches with the provisional cast on with a crochet hook see tutorial which will give you approx 13 5cm/5 3in leg length without cuff before star cid 415 ng the heel flap row 1 ws with your working yarn start the chart sl1pwyf knit 38 sl1pwyf *2+3 row 2 rs knit all s cid 415 tches row 3 ws sl1pwyf knit 9st push one bead as far as possible up to the last kni cid
